string.description: name of the ConnectAudit
resource content will be returned as it was at the time of this git hash
the namespace scope in which to operate
ConnectPluginName refers to the ConnectPlugin being audited.

bool.description: Finished indicates whether the ConnectAudit is done running.

string.description:
Scope indicates the scope of the ConnectAudit.
Currently supported scopes: PLUGIN

single_nested.description: ConnectAuditSpec defines the desired state of ConnectAudit.

string.description: EndTime is when the ConnectAudit reaches a completed State.
EnqueueTime is the starting time of the ConnectAudit.
FailureReason indicates the reason for a Failure Outcome.

Outcome indicates the outcome of the ConnectAudit once it is Finished.
Possible values are Success|Failure.

AuditType is the type of this Result.
Possible values are ConnectPluginAudit
FailureReason indicates the reason for a Failure Outcome.
ConnectResourceKind is the kind of the resource in Connect.
ConnectResourceName is the (k8s) name of the resource in Connect.
FailureReason indicates the reason for a Failure Outcome.

Outcome indicates the outcome of this Discrepancy.
Possible values are Success|Failure
PluginResourceKind is the kind of the resource in the Plugin environment.
PluginResourceURI is the URI of the resource in the Plugin environment.
Type of discrepancy found during the Audit.

list_nested.description: FoundDiscrepancies is a list of found and or corrected discrepancies.

string.description:
Outcome indicates the outcome of this Result once it is Finished.
Possible values are Success|Failure

State indicates the state of this Result.
Possible values are Scheduled|Finished|InProgress

list_nested.description: Results is a list of Audit substeps performed.

string.description:
State indicates the state of the overall ConnectAudit.
Possible values are Scheduled|Finished|InProgress.

int64.description: TotalNumberOfDiscrepancies indicates the amount of entries in the Audit Report.

TotalNumberOfFailedDiscrepancies indicates the amount of entries in the Results that have failed
to be resolved. Manual action is required here.

TotalNumberOfSuccessfulDiscrepancies indicates the amount of entries in the Audit Report that have successfully
been resolved.

single_nested.description: ConnectAuditStatus defines the observed state of ConnectAudit.

string.description: a comma-separated list of resource fields to fetch/return.  If unspecified, all fields are fetched.  If empty, only key-fields are fetched.
an EQL "where" expression that will be used to filter the set of resources returned.
a label selector string to filter the results based on CR labels
Deprecated: a label selector string to filter the results based on CR labels
the namespace scope in which to operate
ConnectPluginName refers to the ConnectPlugin being audited.

bool.description: Finished indicates whether the ConnectAudit is done running.

string.description:
Scope indicates the scope of the ConnectAudit.
Currently supported scopes: PLUGIN

string.description: EndTime is when the ConnectAudit reaches a completed State.
EnqueueTime is the starting time of the ConnectAudit.
FailureReason indicates the reason for a Failure Outcome.

Outcome indicates the outcome of the ConnectAudit once it is Finished.
Possible values are Success|Failure.

AuditType is the type of this Result.
Possible values are ConnectPluginAudit
FailureReason indicates the reason for a Failure Outcome.
ConnectResourceKind is the kind of the resource in Connect.
ConnectResourceName is the (k8s) name of the resource in Connect.
FailureReason indicates the reason for a Failure Outcome.

Outcome indicates the outcome of this Discrepancy.
Possible values are Success|Failure
PluginResourceKind is the kind of the resource in the Plugin environment.
PluginResourceURI is the URI of the resource in the Plugin environment.
Type of discrepancy found during the Audit.

list_nested.description: FoundDiscrepancies is a list of found and or corrected discrepancies.

string.description:
Outcome indicates the outcome of this Result once it is Finished.
Possible values are Success|Failure

State indicates the state of this Result.
Possible values are Scheduled|Finished|InProgress

list_nested.description: Results is a list of Audit substeps performed.

string.description:
State indicates the state of the overall ConnectAudit.
Possible values are Scheduled|Finished|InProgress.

int64.description: TotalNumberOfDiscrepancies indicates the amount of entries in the Audit Report.

TotalNumberOfFailedDiscrepancies indicates the amount of entries in the Results that have failed

string.description: name of the ConnectInterface
resource content will be returned as it was at the time of this git hash
the namespace scope in which to operate
ChassisID is the Chassis Id of the top-of-rack switch to which this compute interface is connected, received through LLDP.
HostName is the FQDN of the host this compute port belongs to (eg. compute01.example.com).
InterfaceName is the interface name of the compute port (eg. eth0).
PortID is the Port Id of the top-of-rack switch to which this compute interface is connected, received through LLDP.
SystemName is the name of the top-of-rack switch to which this compute interface is connected, received through LLDP.

single_nested.description: Bond is an Optional Bond definition, indicating the naming of a Bond on the Compute.

string.description: ChassisID is the Chassis Id of the top-of-rack switch to which this compute interface is connected, received through LLDP.
HostName is the FQDN of the host this compute port belongs to (eg. compute01.example.com).
InterfaceName is the interface name of the compute port (eg. eth0).
PortID is the Port Id of the top-of-rack switch to which this compute interface is connected, received through LLDP.
SystemName is the name of the top-of-rack switch to which this compute interface is connected, received through LLDP.

list_nested.description:
Members is a list of InterfaceMembers indicating which Compute Interfaces are part of this ConnectInterface.
For non-LAG interfaces, this is a list of one element.

single_nested.description: ConnectInterfaceSpec defines the desired state of ConnectInterface.

string.description: Indicates the current EDA CachedInterface this ConnectInterface is connected to.
Indicates the current operational state of the ConnectInterface

single_nested.description: ConnectInterfaceStatus defines the observed state of ConnectInterface

Deprecated: a label selector string to filter the results based on CR labels
the namespace scope in which to operate

PortID is the Port Id of the top-of-rack switch to which this compute interface is connected, received through LLDP.

string.description: name of the ConnectPlugin
resource content will be returned as it was at the time of this git hash
the namespace scope in which to operate

int64.description:
HeartbeatInterval indicates in seconds the interval in which the Plugin will heartbeat.
When the interval is 0, heartbeating will be disabled.

string.description: Name is a human-readable representation of the Plugin.
PluginType identifies the type of the Plugin. Eg. VMware, OpenStack.

list.description: A list of ConnectPlugins whose resources this ConnectPlugin will require
SupportedActionables is a List of Actionable identifiers that this Plugin supports.

single_nested.description: ConnectPluginSpec defines the desired state of ConnectPlugin.

bool.description:
When a plugin registers with a certain heartbeatinterval and it does not meet that contract, Connect will assume
that the plugin is Stale / non-responsive. An alarm is raised when the plugin is Stale.

single_nested.description: ConnectPluginStatus defines the observed state of ConnectPlugin.

string.description: name of the ConnectPluginActionable
resource content will be returned as it was at the time of this git hash
the namespace scope in which to operate

map.description: Attributes is a map of attributes associated with the Verb for this Actionable.

string.description: Verb is the keyword for the operation that should be executed by the Plugin.

single_nested.description: ConnectPluginActionableSpec defines the desired state of ConnectPluginActionable.
ConnectPluginActionableStatus defines the observed state of ConnectPluginActionable.

string.description: a comma-separated list of resource fields to fetch/return.  If unspecified, all fields are fetched.  If empty, only key-fields are fetched.

a label selector string to filter the results based on CR labels
Deprecated: a label selector string to filter the results based on CR labels
the namespace scope in which to operate
